DOC.brief_summary: This study will test the hypothesis that GW427353, a beta-3 adrenergic agonist, will relieve IBS pain or discomfort and associated symptoms in IBS patients.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate GW427353 In Subjects With Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of IBS which meets the Rome II criteria, screening pain score to be > 1.5 (0= no pain, 4 = very severe pain) Subjects not meeting the Rome II criteria for the diagnosis of IBS Subjects with no stool for 7 days during the screen
